QuestData.Title: Already Among Us
QuestData.Description:
Sylvanas still commands the loyalty of many within the Horde. The war she started has blinded them with rage and hatred. She exploits that to maintain her support.
<Saurfang scowls.>
They do not yet see she will lead us to ruin, that her so-called victories are all hollow.
Some of her agents have been spotted lurking within our ranks. Kill them. They will show us no mercy, and will have none in return.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 10 Suspicious Technicians or Loyalist Assassins.
